body_html:
For now, I think you can convert the h5py as numpy which is one time cost. If this has more cost than expected or it is extremely inconvenient, we can revisit this PR and propose some new ideas.

With that said, I will close this PR and please reopen if anything changed in future.

Thanks for your contribution!
body_text:
For now, I think you can convert the h5py as numpy which is one time cost. If this has more cost than expected or it is extremely inconvenient, we can revisit this PR and propose some new ideas.
With that said, I will close this PR and please reopen if anything changed in future.
Thanks for your contribution!
body:
For now, I think you can convert the h5py as numpy which is one time cost. If this has more cost than expected or it is extremely inconvenient, we can revisit this PR and propose some new ideas. 

With that said, I will close this PR and please reopen if anything changed in future. 

Thanks for your contribution!
